EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-06-Field-East-ESB-DC.Marketing Invitation 1.EMAIL - Marketing Save t
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Washington Wizards vs Miami Heat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in Washington D.C. for a presentation on workload automation at the Capital One Arena followed by an evening of basketball as the Washington Wizards take on the Miami Heat. Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. While you can't automate people, your can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth.
Executive Networking Series Washington D.C. Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud Washington Wizards vs Miami Heat Tuesday, March 6th | Capital One Arena | 5:30 p.m.
Join your peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Save the date for March 6th at 5:30 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/exec-district <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-district/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
